The sides are parallel and the top and bottom faces are perpendicular to the sides. The dimensions of the sides are equal and the height is half the width. 1. Set up a new coordinate system with euler angles 0.0, 0.0, 0.0 and translation vector 0.0, 0.0, 0.0. 2. Begin by creating a new 2D sketch on face_1. * Create a loop, loop_1, with 4 lines. * line_1: Start Point (0.0, 0.0), End Point (0.7499, 0.0). * line_2: Start Point (0.7499, 0.0), End Point (0.7499, 0.7499). * line_3: Start Point (0.7499, 0.7499), End Point (0.0, 0.7499). * line_4: Start Point (0.0, 0.7499), End Point (0.0, 0.0). 3. Scale the 2D sketch using a scaling factor of 0.7499. 4. Transform the scaled 2D sketch into 3D by setting the euler angles to 0.0, 0.0, 0.0 and the translation vector to 0.0, 0.0, 0.0. 5. Extrude the 2D sketch to generate the 3D model. * Extrude_depth_towards_normal: 0.75. * Extrude_depth_opposite_normal: 0.0. * Operation: NewBodyFeatureOperation. Once completed, the length, width, and height of the part are as follows: - Length: 0.7499. - Width: 0.7499. - Height: 0.75. Part 2: Rectangular Prism with a Cylindrical Hole Construct a rectangular prism with a cylindrical hole in the center. 1. Set up a new coordinate system with euler angles 0.0, 0.0, -90.0 and translation vector 0.2406, 0.0, 0.2293. 2. Begin by creating a new 2D sketch on face_1. * Create a loop, loop_1, with 4 lines. * line_1: Start Point (0.0, 0.0), End Point (0.2518, 0.0). * line_2: Start Point (0.2518, 0.0), End Point (0.2518, 0.5207). * line_3: Start Point (0.2518, 0.5207), End Point (0.0, 0.5207). * line_4: Start Point (0.0, 0.5207), End Point (0.0, 0.0). 3. Scale the 2D sketch using a scaling factor of 0.5207. 4. Transform the scaled 2D sketch into 3D by setting the euler angles to 0.0, 0.0, -90.0 and the translation vector to 0.2406, 0.0, 0.2293. 5. Extrude the 2D sketch to generate the 3D model. * Extrude_depth_towards_normal: 0.0. * Extrude_depth_opposite_normal: 0.75. * Operation: CutFeatureOperation. Once completed, the length, width, and height of the part are as follows: - Length: 0.5207. - Width: 0.75. - Height: 0.5207.</description>
